SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven Polytechnic relative to Aethelgard School of Arts?
SRP.A: Silverhaven Polytechnic is {below} Aethelgard School of Arts in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total student-teacher ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aethelgard School of Arts}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total student-teacher ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Meridian Academy}.

VE.A: Zenith Institute of Technology's student-teacher ratio in 1978 is {17.05} ratio.

VE.Q: What are the student-teacher ratio of Silverhaven Polytechnic, Zenith Institute of Technology, and Meridian Academy in 1975?
VE.A: Silverhaven Polytechnic's student-teacher ratio is {19.85} ratio, Zenith Institute of Technology's student-teacher ratio is {19.98} ratio, Meridian Academy's student-teacher ratio is {20.17} ratio.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1982, did the total Student-Teacher Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1979?
NC.A: The change in total student-teacher ratio between 1975 and 1982 was {larger} than between 1978 and 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1979, was the average total Student-Teacher Ratio higher or lower than between 1975 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total student-teacher ratio between 1976 and 1979 was {lower} than between 1975 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1980, did the total Student-Teacher Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 1977 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total student-teacher ratio between 1977 and 1980 was {smaller} than between 1977 and 1982.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Aethelgard School of Arts} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Meridian Academy, Zenith Institute of Technology, Silverhaven Polytechnic, Aethelgard School of Arts}.
